selected_skills.name: format_final
selected_skills.purpose: Format the final answer as a single line output.

new_skill_specs.name: extract_volume_from_image
new_skill_specs.purpose: Extract the largest volume marking from the image of a measuring cup.
new_skill_specs.outputs: The largest volume marking as an integer.
edge_cases: Image contains unclear or overlapping markings
